label: Post Conversion Function
helpText:
If you configure here a JavaScript function, this function will get in the first paramater the rendered HTML text and must return the modified HTML text, which will be send then to the preview container.

Example:

function (text) { 
    return text + 
        "<br>\n**This is not bold, because " + 
        "it was added after the conversion**";
}

ATTENTION: There is only one converter for all conversions on a page. If you configure here a function to modify the HTML then this will applied to all conversions
